nodes.id: 中国共产党中央委员会主席

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会主席

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在1945年至1982年间的最高负责人职务，由中共中央选举产生。此职务的担任者是当时中华人民共和国实际上的最高决策者。该职务于中共十二大后被撤销。
description.en: The highest leadership position of the Communist Party of China from 1945 to 1982, elected by the CPC Central Committee. The holder of this position was the de facto paramount decision-maker of the People's Republic of China. The position was abolished after the 12th National Congress of the CPC.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党、中国人民解放军和中华人民共和国的主要缔造者和领导人，首任中国共产党中央委员会主席。
description.en: A primary founder and leader of the Communist Party of China, the People's Liberation Army, and the People's Republic of China, and the first Chairman of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国前主要领导人之一，是唯一一位同时担任过中共中央主席、国务院总理和中央军委主席的领导人。
description.en: A former primary leader of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, and the only leader to have simultaneously held the positions of CPC Central Committee Chairman, Premier of the State Council, and Chairman of the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国前主要领导人之一，曾任中国共产党中央委员会主席和中央委员会总书记。
description.en: A former primary leader of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, who served as Chairman of the CPC Central Committee and General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee.

nodes.id: 中国共产党第七次全国代表大会

zh-cn: 中国共产党第七次全国代表大会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的一次重要会议，在此次会议后的一中全会上正式设立了中央委员会主席的职务。
description.en: An important congress of the Communist Party of China, during the first plenary session of which the position of Chairman of the Central Committee was formally established.

nodes.id: 中国共产党第十二次全国代表大会

zh-cn: 中国共产党第十二次全国代表大会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的一次重要会议，在此次会议上决定修改党章，不再设立中央委员会主席，改设中央委员会总书记。
description.en: An important congress of the Communist Party of China, where it was decided to amend the party constitution, abolishing the position of Chairman of the Central Committee and establishing the position of General Secretary of the Central Committee.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央委员会总书记

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会总书记

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的最高负责人职务，于1982年中共十二大后取代中央委员会主席一职。
description.en: The highest leadership position of the Communist Party of China, which replaced the position of Chairman of the Central Committee after the 12th National Congress of the CPC in 1982.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央政治局

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央政治局

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的中央领导机构之一，其工作受中国共产党中央委员会主席领导。
description.en: One of the central leading bodies of the Communist Party of China, whose work was led by the Chairman of the CPC Central Committee.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央书记处

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央书记处

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的中央领导机构之一，其工作受中国共产党中央委员会主席领导。
description.en: One of the central leading bodies of the Communist Party of China, whose work was led by the Chairman of the CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党早期领导人之一，曾另立“第二中央”并自任“中国共产党中央委员会主席”，此职务不被中共官方承认。
description.en: An early leader of the Communist Party of China who once established a rival 'Second Central Committee' and self-proclaimed himself 'Chairman of the CPC Central Committee', a position not officially recognized by the CPC.

description.zh-cn: 一个国际共产主义组织，曾对中国共产党早期活动产生重要影响。
description.en: An international communist organization that had a significant influence on the early activities of the Communist Party of China.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的中央权力机关，负责选举中央委员会主席。
description.en: The central authority of the Communist Party of China, responsible for electing the Chairman of the Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 由毛泽东发动和领导的政治运动，期间民主集中制被破坏，中共中央主席的权力进一步扩大。
description.en: A political movement initiated and led by Mao Zedong, during which the principle of democratic centralism was undermined, and the power of the CPC Central Committee Chairman was further expanded.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的武装力量。根据《七五宪法》和《七八宪法》，由中国共产党中央委员会主席统帅。
description.en: The armed forces of the People's Republic of China. According to the 1975 and 1978 Constitutions, it was commanded by the Chairman of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的第二部宪法，规定中国共产党中央委员会主席统率全国武装力量。
description.en: The second constitution of the People's Republic of China, which stipulated that the Chairman of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China commands the nation's armed forces.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的第三部宪法，规定中华人民共和国武装力量由中国共产党中央委员会主席统帅。
description.en: The third constitution of the People's Republic of China, which stipulated that the armed forces of the People's Republic of China are commanded by the Chairman of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China.

nodes.id: 中国共产党集体领导制度

zh-cn: 中国共产党集体领导制度

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的组织原则和领导制度。为了完善该制度，中共十二大决定废除中央委员会主席职务。
description.en: The organizational principle and leadership system of the Communist Party of China. To improve this system, the 12th National Congress of the CPC decided to abolish the position of Chairman of the Central Committee.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央委员会副主席

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会副主席

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在1956年至1982年间设立的职务，地位仅次于党主席。
description.en: A position established by the Communist Party of China from 1956 to 1982, second in rank only to the Party Chairman.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国元帅，曾任中共中央副主席，在九一三事件中坠机身亡。
description.en: A Marshal of the People's Republic of China, who served as Vice Chairman of the CPC Central Committee and died in a plane crash during the Lin Biao incident.

description.zh-cn: 指时任中共中央副主席林彪及其家人在蒙古的坠机事件。
description.en: Refers to the plane crash in Mongolia involving the then Vice Chairman of the CPC Central Committee, Lin Biao, and his family.

description.zh-cn: “四人帮”成员之一，曾任中共中央副主席，后在粉碎四人帮事件中被捕。
description.en: A member of the 'Gang of Four', who served as Vice Chairman of the CPC Central Committee and was later arrested in the incident that smashed the Gang of Four.

en: Smashing of the Gang of Four

description.zh-cn: 指以华国锋、叶剑英、汪东兴等人为首的中共中央，对“四人帮”及其在北京的党羽进行政治清洗的事件。
description.en: Refers to the political purge conducted by the CPC Central Committee, led by figures such as Hua Guofeng, Ye Jianying, and Wang Dongxing, against the 'Gang of Four' and their supporters in Beijing.

relationships.source: 中国共产党第七次全国代表大会
relationships.target: 中国共产党中央委员会主席

description.zh-cn: 在1945年6月19日举行的中共七届一中全会上，正式设立了中国共产党中央委员会主席的职务。
description.en: At the First Plenary Session of the 7th CPC Central Committee held on June 19, 1945, the position of Chairman of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China was formally established.

relationships.source: 中国共产党第十二次全国代表大会
relationships.target: 中国共产党中央委员会主席

description.zh-cn: 中共十二大决定修改党章，不再设立中央委员会主席职务。
description.en: The 12th National Congress of the CPC decided to amend the party constitution and abolish the position of Chairman of the Central Committee.

relationships.source: 中国共产党第十二次全国代表大会
relationships.target: 中国共产党中央委员会总书记

description.zh-cn: 中共十二大决定修改党章，设立中央委员会总书记以取代中央委员会主席的职务。
description.en: The 12th National Congress of the CPC decided to amend the party constitution, establishing the position of General Secretary of the Central Committee to replace the position of Chairman of the Central Committee.

relationships.target: 中国共产党中央委员会主席

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东是中国共产党首任中央委员会主席，自1945年当选直至逝世。
description.en: Mao Zedong was the first Chairman of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, serving from his election in 1945 until his death.

relationships.target: 中国共产党中央委员会主席

description.zh-cn: 华国锋是继毛泽东之后的第二任中共中央主席。
description.en: Hua Guofeng was the second Chairman of the CPC Central Committee, succeeding Mao Zedong.

relationships.target: 中国共产党中央委员会主席

description.zh-cn: 胡耀邦是第三任也是最后一任中共中央主席。
description.en: Hu Yaobang was the third and last Chairman of the CPC Central Committee.

relationships.source: 中国共产党中央政治局
relationships.target: 中国共产党中央委员会主席

description.zh-cn: 中共中央主席领导中共中央政治局的工作。
description.en: The Chairman of the CPC Central Committee led the work of the Political Bureau of the CPC Central Committee.

relationships.source: 中国共产党中央书记处
relationships.target: 中国共产党中央委员会主席

description.zh-cn: 中共中央主席领导中共中央书记处的工作。
description.en: The Chairman of the CPC Central Committee led the work of the Secretariat of the CPC Central Committee.

relationships.source: 中国共产党中央委员会

description.zh-cn: 1945年6月19日，中共中央举行七届一中全会，毛泽东在会上被选为中国共产党中央委员会主席。
description.en: On June 19, 1945, the CPC Central Committee held the First Plenary Session of the 7th Central Committee, where Mao Zedong was elected Chairman of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 在共产国际和中共中央的压力下，张国焘于1936年6月6日宣布取消其另立的“第二中央”，并辞去“党主席”职务。
description.en: Under pressure from the Comintern and the CPC Central Committee, Zhang Guotao announced the dissolution of his rival 'Second Central Committee' on June 6, 1936, and resigned from the position of 'Party Chairman'.

relationships.target: 中国共产党中央委员会主席

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命时期，中共中央主席的权力进一步扩大，对国家大小事务拥有最终决定权。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution, the power of the CPC Central Committee Chairman was further expanded, granting the holder final decision-making authority over all state affairs.

relationships.target: 中国共产党中央委员会主席

description.zh-cn: 根据《七五宪法》和《七八宪法》，全国武装力量由中国共产党中央委员会主席统率。
description.en: According to the 1975 and 1978 Constitutions, the nation's armed forces were commanded by the Chairman of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China.

relationships.source: 中国共产党集体领导制度
relationships.target: 中国共产党中央委员会主席

description.zh-cn: 为了完善集体领导制度，中共十二大决定废除中央委员会主席职务。
description.en: In order to improve the system of collective leadership, the 12th National Congress of the CPC decided to abolish the position of Chairman of the Central Committee.

relationships.source: 中国共产党中央委员会副主席
relationships.target: 中国共产党中央委员会主席

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会副主席的地位仅次于党主席。
description.en: The position of Vice Chairman of the CPC Central Committee was second in rank only to the Party Chairman.

description.zh-cn: 时任中共中央副主席林彪在九一三事件中坠机身亡。
description.en: The then Vice Chairman of the CPC Central Committee, Lin Biao, died in a plane crash during the September 13 Incident.

description.zh-cn: 时任中共中央副主席王洪文在粉碎四人帮事件中被捕。
description.en: The then Vice Chairman of the CPC Central Committee, Wang Hongwen, was arrested during the smashing of the Gang of Four.
